short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pomodoro timer for the fitness minded, or the mindful sedentary

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Why was this made and what's it for? I spend many hours at my computer, and although I love my job this sedentary lifestyle gets to me.  I've been using Pomodoro timers for some time and I thought it might be a good idea to mix mini exercise routines into the Pomodoro breaks. 

This is good for the body, helps with posture, and gets the blood flowing. It can only be a good thing for work.  This is a VERY early draft for what I have in mind, but I hope you'll find it useful.
